response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value for us at $1,200,000, reflecting its unparalleled quality and unique features. Given its significance, we are offering it to you at a special price tailored to your needs. Our proposed offer is $950,000. We believe this price not only reflects the true worth of the product but also provides you with a substantial saving compared to its market value. Please let us know if this proposal meets your expectations and if you would like to proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 950000}
